languages.text: {n}Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус яростно листает что-то на {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластине{/g} и отдает приказы по позолоченному {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}воксу{/g}. При виде вас она спешно убирает устройства, разглаживает юбку и опускается в глубоком книксене.{/n} "Ваше Сиятельство, примите мои глубочайшие извинения за отвратительную выходку, испортившую прием! Даже в самых страшных снах я не могла себе представить..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус яростно листает что-то на дата-слейте и отдает приказы по позолоченному воксу. При виде вас она заканчивает разговор, убирает устройство и придает лицу тщательно выверенное выражение скорби.{/n} "Ваше сиятельство, примите мои искренние извинения за эту отвратительную выходку моих подданных. Даже в самых страшных снах я не могла представить, что безмозглое отребье, саботирующее работу агромира, найдет способ пробраться в мое поместье. Расследование происшествия уже в полном разгаре".

languages.text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"
languages.original_text: {n}Вистенца Янус Вьятт аб Арам аф Коронус яростно листает что-то на {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластине{/g} и отдает приказы по позолоченному {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}воксу{/g}. При виде вас она спешно убирает устройства, разглаживает юбку и опускается в глубоком книксене.{/n} "Ваше Сиятельство, примите мои глубочайшие извинения за отвратительную выходку, испортившую прием! Даже в самых страшных снах я не могла себе представить..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a data-slate, issuing commands into a gilded vox. Upon seeing you, she cuts off her conversation, puts down the data-slate, and fixes a carefully calculated expression of sorrow on her face.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my apologies for the abhorrent actions of my subjects. Even in my most terrible dreams, I could never have imagined that mindless slaughter sabotaging the work of the Agri-World would find a way to penetrate my estate."

{n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a data-slate, issuing commands into a gilded vox. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly hides her devices, smoothes her skirt, and lowers herself in a deep curtsey.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my apologies for the abhorrent actions that ruined the reception! Even in my most terrible dreams, I could never have imagined..."

{n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a data-slate, issuing commands into a gilded vox. Upon seeing you, she cuts off her conversation, puts down the data-slate, and fixes a carefully calculated expression of sorrow on her face.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my apologies for the abhorrent actions of my subjects. Even in my most terrible dreams, I could never have imagined that mindless slaughter sabotaging the work of the Agri-World would find a way to penetrate my estate."

Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsey.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the abhorrent actions that ruined the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

{n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsey.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯正在愤怒地操作着{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，朝一个镀金的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发着命令。看到你之后，她急忙收好她的设备，抚平她的裙子，之后朝你深深地鞠了个躬。{/n}“大人，您的招待会遭到了不速之客的破坏，请接受我发自内心的歉意。即便是在我最糟糕的噩梦中，我也无法想象会——”
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨·加努斯·维亚特·阿布·阿拉姆·阿夫·科罗努斯正在愤怒地操作着{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}，朝一个镀金的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置发着命令。看到你之后，她急忙收好她的设备，抚平她的裙子，之后朝你深深地鞠了个躬。{/n}“大人，您的招待会遭到了不速之客的破坏，请接受我发自内心的歉意。即便是在我最糟糕的噩梦中，我也无法想象会——”

languages.text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus está aporreando una {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} a la vez que da órdenes por un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} dorado. Al verte, guarda rápidamente sus dispositivos, se alisa la falda y te hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepte por favor mis más humildes disculpas por ese espantoso suceso que ha arruinado la recepción! Ni en mis peores pesadillas hubiera imaginado que...».
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus está aporreando una {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} a la vez que da órdenes por un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} dorado. Al verte, guarda rápidamente sus dispositivos, se alisa la falda y te hace una reverencia.{/n} «¡Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepte por favor mis más humildes disculpas por ese espantoso suceso que ha arruinado la recepción! Ni en mis peores pesadillas hubiera imaginado que...».

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌスは怒りまかせに{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を通すと、金色の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}にコマンドを入力する。こちらを見たヴィステンツァは大急ぎで端末を片付けると、スカートの乱れを整えてから深々と頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下、歓迎の式典を台無しにするという非難されるべき愚かな行いを、何卒お許しください！最悪の悪夢ですら見たことがない、このような事態は予想だにしないもので—」
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィステンツァ・ヤヌス・ビャット・アブ・アラム・アフ・コロヌスは怒りまかせに{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を通すと、金色の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}にコマンドを入力する。こちらを見たヴィステンツァは大急ぎで端末を片付けると、スカートの乱れを整えてから深々と頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下、歓迎の式典を台無しにするという非難されるべき愚かな行いを、何卒お許しください！最悪の悪夢ですら見たことがない、このような事態は予想だにしないもので—」

languages.text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus schlägt wütend auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} ein und spricht Befehle in ein goldenes {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}. Als sie dich sieht, steckt sie rasch ihre Geräte weg, glättet ihren Rock und macht einen tiefen Knicks.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte akzeptiert meine demütige Entschuldigung für den abscheulichen Vorfall, der den Empfang ruiniert hat! Selbst in meinen schlimmsten Albträumen hätte ich mir niemals vorstellen können ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus schlägt wütend auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} ein und spricht Befehle in ein goldenes {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}. Als sie dich sieht, steckt sie rasch ihre Geräte weg, glättet ihren Rock und macht einen tiefen Knicks.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte akzeptiert meine demütige Entschuldigung für den abscheulichen Vorfall, der den Empfang ruiniert hat! Selbst in meinen schlimmsten Albträumen hätte ich mir niemals vorstellen können ..."

languages.text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus feuillette furieusement sa {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} tout en donnant des ordres dans un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} doré. Lorsqu'elle vous voit, elle se dépêche de ranger ses appareils, époussette sa jupe et vous adresse une révérence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous prie d'accepter mes plus plates excuses pour ce déplorable incident qui a gâché la réception ! Même dans mes pires cauchemars, jamais je n'aurais imaginé... »
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus feuillette furieusement sa {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} tout en donnant des ordres dans un {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} doré. Lorsqu'elle vous voit, elle se dépêche de ranger ses appareils, époussette sa jupe et vous adresse une révérence.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous prie d'accepter mes plus plates excuses pour ce déplorable incident qui a gâché la réception ! Même dans mes pires cauchemars, jamais je n'aurais imaginé... »

languages.text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databelayı{/g} öfkeyle kurcalayarak yaldızlı {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksa{/g} emir yağdırıyor. Seni görünce alelacele cihazlarını bırakıyor, eteğini düzeltiyor ve abartı bir reveransla eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ne kadar kifayetsiz kalsalar da karşılama merasimini mahveden rezil gösteri için naçiz özürlerimi kabul buyurun! Bu durumu aklım hayalim almıyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus is furiously swiping at a {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g}, issuing commands into a gilded {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}. Upon seeing you, she hurriedly puts away her devices, smooths her skirt, and drops into a deep curtsy.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, accept my abject apologies for the reprehensible stunt that spoiled the reception! Even in my worst nightmares, I could never have imagined—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza Janus Vyatt ab Aram af Koronus, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}databela{/g}yı öfkeyle kurcalayarak yaldızlı {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}a emir yağdırıyor. Seni görünce aceleyle cihazlarını bırakıyor, eteğini düzeltiyor ve yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, her ne kadar kifayetsiz kalsalar da karşılama merasimini mahveden adi sefiller için özürlerimi kabul edin! Bu durumu aklım hayalim almıyor..."
